channel.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect on SoftLayer API

item.title: activateOpenIdConnectUser
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [string, SoftLayer_User_Customer, string]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect/activateOpenIdConnectUser'
